data.title: ஜீவா பொது தகவல் & அறிவு களஞ்சியம் - Jeeva General Information & Knowledge Repository
data.meta_description: FM Radio Stations List in Tamilnadu              Sl.   No         FM   Radio Station Name         FM   Radio Station Frequency (MHz)      ...
data.text:
Sl. No

FM Radio Station Name

FM Radio Station Frequency (MHz)

Places telecast of FM Radio Station

FM Radio Station Description & Notes

1

Radio City

91.1 MHz

Chennai & Coimbatore

It is India’s first FM Radio Station. It was first founded in Bangalore on July 3rd, 2001 and in Chennai on July 7th, 2006.

2

Aahaa FM

91.9 MHz

Chennai

It was started in 2006.

3

Big FM

92.7 MHz

Chennai & Pondicherry

It was started in Chennai on September 27th, 2006.

4

Suriyan FM

93.5 MHz

Chennai, Kovai, Madurai, Pondy, Trichy, Nellai & Thoothukkudi

-

5

Radio Mirchi

98.3 MHz

Chennai, Kovai & Madurai

It was first started in India in 1993 and in Kovai in November 2007. Upto 1993, AIR was only FM Radio Station in India.

6

Hello FM

106.4 MHz

Chennai, Kovai, Madurai, Pondy, Trichy & Nellai

It was first broadcast in Chennai & Kovai in 2006. Later in 2007, it expanded its broadcast to other cities in Tamilnadu.

7

Rainbow FM, Chennai (AIR)

101.4 MHz

Chennai, Pondy, Karaikal, Kovai & 8 other places

It is also known as ‘Akashwani’ since 1956. Upto 1993, AIR was only FM Radio Station in India.

8

Gold FM, Chennai (AIR)

102.3 MHz

Chennai

Its first FM Radio telecast in India is in 1927 (or) 1930.

9

Radio One

94.3 MHz

Chennai

It was first broadcast in Mumbai on June 8th, 2006.

10

Chennai Live

104.8 MHz

Chennai

It is the first English FM Radio Station of Chennai.

11

Anna FM

90.4 MHz

Chennai

-

12

Loyolo FM

90.8 MHz

Chennai

-

107.8 MHz

Chennai
